Projects

ICAF Conference Management Tool

SLIIT Project

This project is about the conference management web application. Our team had four members. I developed both frontend and backend. We did frontend using React Js and material UI components. To manage state, we used redux library. For the backend we used Node Js and express Js.

January 2021 - July 2021

ITP Yummy Hut group project

SLIIT Project

This project is about the restaurant management system. We developed frontend and backend using Laravel framework. To manage version control we used Git and GitHub. For the database we used MySQL.

July 2020 - December 2020

MAD project Catalogue App

SLIIT Project

This project is about catalogue mobile application. To develop mobile application using Java. We did backend using firebase. To do this project we follow OOP concepts.

July 2019 - December 2019

Interests
